abstract: A "60 Minutes" interview with Steve Jobs's biographer included recordings of the late Apple chief executive officer describing a chance encounter with his biological father.
snippet: A "60 Minutes" interview with Steve Jobs's biographer included recordings of the late Apple chief executive officer describing a chance encounter with his biological father.
lead_paragraph: A Sunday night interview on "60 Minutes" with Steve Jobs's  biographer, Walter Isaacson, included audio recordings of Mr. Jobs describing a remarkable moment in his life: an accidental encounter with his biological father.

headline.main: Steve Jobs's Search for His Father
